scripts.migrate: bun run generate-env && env $(cat .env .env.generated | xargs) bunx prisma migrate dev
scripts.generate: bun run generate-env && env $(cat .env .env.generated | xargs) bunx prisma generate
scripts.studio: bun run generate-env && env $(cat .env .env.generated | xargs) npx prisma studio
scripts.reset: bun run generate-env && env $(cat .env .env.generated | xargs) bunx prisma migrate reset
scripts.reset-seed: bun run generate-env && env $(cat .env .env.generated | xargs) bunx prisma migrate reset && bun run seed
